LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Gladiator.label: Gladiator
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Gladiator.description: A melee specialized variant of the Ronin. The Gladiator maintains the Ronin's mobility and armor and comes with an upgraded melee combat module and is equipped with an assault shield.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Phalanx.label: Phalanx
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Phalanx.description: The Phalanx is a cheap mass-producable variant specialized for urban combat. It comes packed with assault armor and high mobility package making it a fierce unit in close quarters combat.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Phalanx.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Phalanx.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Phalanx.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Protector.label: Protector
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Protector.description: The protector is designed for peacekeeping operations and riot control. This model is equipped with strong armor around its frame and has a huge flash shield to compliment the use of close quater weapons like batons or shotguns.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ronin.label: Ronin
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ronin.description: A Humanoid mech model specialized for urban combat, this unit is outfitted with assault armor and a mobility package making it a formidible foe in close quaters.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ronin.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ronin.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ronin.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Siegebreaker.label: Siegebreaker
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Siegebreaker.description: The Siegebreaker comes with top of the line armor making it ideal for sapping and breaching jobs.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Siegebreaker.tools.head.label: head
